meanings.definition: A room or set of rooms below ground level, used for storing food, wine, or coal.
meanings.sent1: The cellar was cool and dark, perfect for storing vegetables.
meanings.sent2: They kept their wine collection in the cellar to preserve its flavor.
meanings.sent3: The cellar was so full of potatoes, it looked like a vegetable jungle down there!
meanings.sent4: Her memories were stored in the cellar of her mind, waiting to be revisited.
meanings.sent5: The cellar smelled of earth and old wood, a comforting scent of nostalgia.
